author: Special Correspondent
title: COVID-19: Infosys employee arrested in Bengaluru for post asking people to spread the virus on social media
description: The post went viral on Thursday. Infosys subsequently ordered an internal probe and terminated his employment.
content:
The Central Crime Branch (CCB) on Friday arrested a software engineer who was employed with Infosys for allegedly putting up a post on social media encouraging people to spread the novel coronavirus.
In his tweet, the accused, Mujeeb Mohammad, 40, wrote, Let… [+1054 chars]
